name: Hard of Hearing
description: Your hearing is defective. The difficulties of any rolls involving the use of hearing are increased by two.

name: Short
description: You are well below average height (4.5 ft / 1.5m or less). Running speed is half of average. Reach is limited.

name: Smell of the Grave
description: You exude an odor of dampness and newly turned earth. Difficulties of all Social rolls to affect mortals increase by one.

name: Tic/Twitch
description: You have a repetitive motion in times of stress (cough, wringing hands). It costs one Willpower to refrain from it.

name: Bad Sight
description: Your sight is defective. Difficulties of eyesight rolls increased by two. (1pt cost assumes corrected with glasses/contacts).

name: Disfigured
description: A hideous disfigurement makes your appearance disturbing. Social interaction difficulties increased by two. Max Appearance 2.

name: Dulled Bite
description: Your fangs never developed properly. You must achieve double successes to make your bite penetrate for feeding.

name: Infectious Bite
description: Your bites have a 1 in 5 chance of becoming infected and causing serious illness in mortals.

name: One Eye
description: You have only one eye. +2 difficulty on Perception rolls involving sight, +1 on rolls requiring depth perception (ranged combat).

name: Vulnerability to Silver
description: Silver causes you aggravated wounds, similar to how it affects werewolves. Mere touch discomfits you.

name: Open Wound
description: You have a wound that refuses to heal and drips blood, costing 1 extra blood point per night. -1 Social difficulty if visible.

name: Addiction
description: You suffer from an addiction to a substance (drugs, alcohol, adrenaline) which must be present in the blood you drink.

name: Child
description: You were a small child (5-10 years) at Embrace. Strength/Stamina limit of 2. +2 difficulty to direct/lead adults.

name: Deformity
description: You have a misshapen limb, hunchback, or clubfoot. Lowers Dexterity by 2 and increases Social difficulties by 1.

name: Glowing Eyes
description: You have stereotypical glowing eyes. -1 difficulty on Intimidation, but large penalties to Stealth and disguise.

name: Lame
description: Your legs are damaged. Walking speed is 1/4 normal, running is impossible.

name: Lazy
description: You avoid effort. Spontaneous Physical action difficulties increase by one (including combat unless planned).

name: Monstrous
description: Your physical form reflects the Beast. Appearance is 0. Cannot be taken by Nosferatu (who already have it).

name: Permanent Fangs
description: Your fangs do not retract. Max Appearance 3. Masquerade risk.

name: Permanent Wound
description: You wake up at the Wounded health level every night due to injuries during the Embrace. Must spend blood to heal.

name: Slow Healing
description: Healing wounds costs double blood points. Aggravated damage heals very slowly (1 level every 5 days).

name: Disease Carrier
description: Your blood carries a lethal disease (HIV, Rabies). You must spend extra blood to suppress symptoms. Can infect others.

name: Deaf
description: You cannot hear. Perception roll difficulties increased by 3. Resistant to Dominate.

name: Mute
description: You cannot speak. You must communicate via sign language or writing.

name: Flesh of the Corpse
description: Your flesh does not regenerate fully; cuts and holes remain visible. Appearance may drop over time.

name: Infertile Vitae
description: You cannot create any childer. Those you try to Embrace die.

name: Blind
description: You cannot see. +2 difficulty on Dexterity rolls. Auspex 2 still works via other senses.

name: Deep Sleeper
description: When you sleep, it is very difficult for you to awaken. The difficulty of any roll to awaken during the day is increased by two.

name: Impatient
description: You have no patience. Every time you are forced to wait, a Self-Control roll is required to see if you go tearing off on your own.

name: Nightmares
description: You experience horrendous nightmares every time you sleep. Upon awakening, make a Willpower roll or lose a die on all actions for the night.

name: Prey Exclusion
description: You refuse to hunt a certain class of prey (e.g., drug dealers, children). Feeding on them causes frenzy and Humanity loss. Ventrue cannot take this.

name: Shy
description: You are ill at ease with people. +2 difficulty on Social rolls with strangers. +3 if center of attention.

name: Soft-Hearted
description: You cannot stand to watch others suffer. Must make Willpower roll to cause pain. Requires Humanity 7+.

name: Speech Impediment
description: You have a stammer or impediment. Verbal communication difficulties increased by two.

name: Amnesia
description: You are unable to remember your past, yourself, or your family. Your history is up to the Storyteller.

name: Lunacy
description: You are affected by the moon phases. Difficulties to avoid frenzy increase as the moon waxes (up to +3 at full moon).

name: Phobia
description: You have an overpowering fear of something (fire, crowds, etc.). Make a Courage roll or flee.

name: Short Fuse
description: You are easily angered. Difficulties to avoid frenzy are two greater. Brujah cannot take this Flaw.

name: Territorial
description: You are extremely territorial. If another vampire enters your domain, you must roll to avoid frenzy and attacking.

name: Vengeful
description: You are obsessed with taking revenge on an individual or group. It is your overriding priority.

name: Victim of the Masquerade
description: You refuse to believe you are a vampire. You try to eat food, find a 'cure', and search for logical explanations. Camarilla only.

name: Weak-Willed
description: You are highly susceptible to Dominate and intimidation. Willpower can never rise above 4.

name: Conspicuous Consumption
description: You must consume your victim's heart, liver, and blood-rich tissue to gain sustenance. Requires killing victims.

name: Guilt-Wracked
description: You suffer horrible guilt every time you feed. Roll Conscience or frenzy. You avoid feeding, leaving you low on blood.

name: Flashbacks
description: Trauma causes unpredictable behavior. Willpower fluctuates wildly between sessions (roll or drop to 1).

name: Dark Secret
description: You have a secret that, if uncovered, would result in immense embarrassment or exile (e.g., murdered an elder, Anarch sympathizer).

name: Expendable
description: Someone in power wants you dead or gone. They maneuver you into dangerous situations 'for the good of the Sect'.

name: Infamous Sire
description: Your sire is distrusted and disliked, and so are you by association.

name: New Arrival
description: You just arrived in the city and know no one. You are ignorant of local politics and history.

name: Enemy
description: You have an enemy who seeks to harm you. The power depends on points (1-5).

name: Hunted
description: You are pursued by a fanatical witch-hunter who believes you are a danger to humanity.

name: Clan Enmity
description: One Clan in particular wants you dead. Every member of that Clan is hostile to you.

name: Blood Hunted
description: You have been made the target of a blood hunt. Returning to your home city is death (4pt) or the entire Camarilla wants you dead (6pt).

name: Botched Presentation
description: You humiliated yourself before the Prince. You must make a Willpower roll to stand before him without making a fool of yourself.

name: Mistaken Identity
description: You look like another Kindred (who likely has a bad reputation). This causes awkward or dangerous situations.

name: Sire's Resentment
description: Your sire dislikes you and wishes you ill. She will actively seek to harm you when possible.

name: Bound
description: You are blood bound to another vampire. Your will is not your own. Sabbat cannot take this.

name: Catspaw
description: You've done dirty work for someone high up. Instead of favor, you are now a liability they want to keep quiet or remove.

name: Masquerade Breaker
description: You accidentally broke the Masquerade. Someone covered for you but now blackmails you. You live in fear of exposure.

name: Disgrace to the Blood
description: Your sire regrets Embracing you and has let everyone know. You are mocked and ignored by your peers.

name: Former Prince
description: You once held absolute power, but lost it. The current Prince sees you as a threat. Machinery is stacked against you.

name: Laughingstock
description: You have drawn the scorn of the Harpies. +2 difficulty on Social rolls in Elysium. Intimidation/Dominate is harder against those who mock you.

name: Red List
description: You are on the Camarilla's most wanted list. Any Camarilla vampire will attack you on sight or call for help.

name: Cast No Reflection
description: You cast no reflection. Detrimental for Masquerade. (Lasombra have this automatically, do not take as Flaw).

name: Repulsed by Garlic
description: You cannot abide garlic. The smell drives you from the room unless you make a Willpower roll.

name: Touch of Frost
description: Plants wither as you approach. Your touch leeches heat from living beings. Reveals nature easily.

name: Cursed
description: You have a specific supernatural curse (e.g., enemies find you, tools break). Strength depends on points (1-5).

name: Beacon of the Unholy
description: You radiate palpable evil. Clergy and devout mortals react with horror or hostility instinctively.

name: Eerie Presence
description: Mortals unconsciously sense your undead nature. +2 difficulty on social interactions with mortals.

name: Lord of the Flies
description: Buzzing flies swirl around you. +1 Social difficulty, +2 Stealth difficulty. Masquerade risk.

name: Can't Cross Running Water
description: You cannot cross running water unless it is 50ft above it or via a bridge. Folkloric weakness.

name: Haunted
description: You are haunted by a tormented spirit (likely a victim). It hinders your actions and feeding.

name: Repelled by Crosses
description: You are repelled by holy symbols. Willpower roll to stay, touch causes aggravated damage.

name: Grip of the Damned
description: There is no ecstasy in your Embrace, only pain. Victims struggle, making feeding difficult. Humanity roll required.

name: Dark Fate
description: You are doomed to experience Final Death or eternal agony. You have visions of it. Lose dice if you don't spend Willpower.

name: Light-Sensitive
description: You are extra sensitive to light. Sunlight causes double damage, moonlight causes lethal. Bright lights hurt.
